title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 109 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 109 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Hold not thy peace, O God of my praise;
lineList.cn: （大卫的诗，交与伶长）我所赞美的神阿，求你不要闭口不言。

lineList.en: For the mouth of the wicked and the mouth of the deceitful are opened against me: they have spoken against me with a lying tongue.
lineList.cn: 因为恶人的嘴，和诡诈人的口，已经张开攻击我。他们用撒谎的舌头对我说话。

lineList.en: They compassed me about also with words of hatred; and fought against me without a cause.
lineList.cn: 他们围绕我，说怨恨的话，又无故地攻打我。

lineList.en: For my love they are my adversaries: but I give myself unto prayer.
lineList.cn: 他们与我为敌以报我爱。但我专心祈祷。

lineList.en: And they have rewarded me evil for good, and hatred for my love.
lineList.cn: 他们向我以恶报善，以恨报爱。

lineList.en: Set thou a wicked man over him: and let Satan stand at his right hand.
lineList.cn: 愿你派一个恶人辖制他，派一个对头站在他右边。

lineList.en: When he shall be judged, let him be condemned: and let his prayer become sin.
lineList.cn: 他受审判的时候，愿他出来担当罪名。愿他的祈祷反成为罪。

lineList.en: Let his days be few; and let another take his office.
lineList.cn: 愿他的年日短少。愿别人得他的职分。

lineList.en: Let his children be fatherless, and his wife a widow.
lineList.cn: 愿他的儿女为孤儿，他的妻子为寡妇。

lineList.en: Let his children be continually vagabonds, and beg: let them seek their bread also out of their desolate places.
lineList.cn: 愿他的儿女漂流讨饭，从他们荒凉之处出来求食。

lineList.en: Let the extortioner catch all that he hath; and let the strangers spoil his labour.
lineList.cn: 愿强暴的债主牢笼他一切所有的。愿外人抢他劳碌得来的。

lineList.en: Let there be none to extend mercy unto him: neither let there be any to favour his fatherless children.
lineList.cn: 愿无人向他延绵施恩。愿无人可怜他的孤儿。

lineList.en: Let his posterity be cut off; and in the generation following let their name be blotted out.
lineList.cn: 愿他的后人断绝，名字被涂抹，不传于下代。

lineList.en: Let the iniquity of his fathers be remembered with the LORD; and let not the sin of his mother be blotted out.
lineList.cn: 愿他祖宗的罪孽被耶和华记念。愿他母亲的罪过不被涂抹。

lineList.en: Let them be before the LORD continually, that he may cut off the memory of them from the earth.
lineList.cn: 愿这些罪常在耶和华面前，使他的名号断绝于世。

lineList.en: Because that he remembered not to shew mercy, but persecuted the poor and needy man, that he might even slay the broken in heart.
lineList.cn: 因为他不想施恩，却逼迫困苦穷乏的，和伤心的人，要把他们治死。

lineList.en: As he loved cursing, so let it come unto him: as he delighted not in blessing, so let it be far from him.
lineList.cn: 他爱咒骂，咒骂就临到他。他不喜爱福乐，福乐就与他远离。

lineList.en: As he clothed himself with cursing like as with his garment, so let it come into his bowels like water, and like oil into his bones.
lineList.cn: 他拿咒骂当衣服穿上。这咒骂就如水进他里面，像油入他的骨头。

lineList.en: Let it be unto him as the garment which covereth him, and for a girdle wherewith he is girded continually.
lineList.cn: 愿这咒骂当他遮身的衣服，当他常束的腰带。

lineList.en: Let this be the reward of mine adversaries from the LORD, and of them that speak evil against my soul.
lineList.cn: 这就是我对头，和用恶言议论我的人，从耶和华那里所受的报应。

lineList.en: But do thou for me, O GOD the Lord, for thy name's sake: because thy mercy is good, deliver thou me.
lineList.cn: 主耶和华阿，求你为你的名恩待我。因你的慈爱美好，求你搭救我。

lineList.en: For I am poor and needy, and my heart is wounded within me.
lineList.cn: 因为我困苦穷乏，内心受伤。

lineList.en: I am gone like the shadow when it declineth: I am tossed up and down as the locust.
lineList.cn: 我如日影渐渐偏斜而去。我如蝗虫被抖出来。

lineList.en: My knees are weak through fasting; and my flesh faileth of fatness.
lineList.cn: 我因禁食，膝骨软弱；我身上的肉也渐渐瘦了。

lineList.en: I became also a reproach unto them: when they looked upon me they shaked their heads.
lineList.cn: 我受他们的羞辱。他们看见我，便摇头。

lineList.en: Help me, O LORD my God: O save me according to thy mercy:
lineList.cn: 耶和华我的神阿，求你帮助我，照你的慈爱拯救我。

lineList.en: That they may know that this is thy hand; that thou, LORD, hast done it.
lineList.cn: 使他们知道这是你的手，是你耶和华所行的事。

lineList.en: Let them curse, but bless thou: when they arise, let them be ashamed; but let thy servant rejoice.
lineList.cn: 任凭他们咒骂。惟愿你赐福。他们几时起来就必蒙羞，你的仆人却要欢喜。

lineList.en: Let mine adversaries be clothed with shame, and let them cover themselves with their own confusion, as with a mantle.
lineList.cn: 愿我的对头，披戴羞辱。愿他们以自己的羞愧为外袍遮身。

lineList.en: I will greatly praise the LORD with my mouth; yea, I will praise him among the multitude.
lineList.cn: 我要用口极力称谢耶和华。我要在众人中间赞美他。

lineList.en: For he shall stand at the right hand of the poor, to save him from those that condemn his soul.
lineList.cn: 因为他必站在穷乏人的右边，要救他脱离审判他灵魂的人。
